text: Cattle Decapitation is an American grindcore band. They were formed in San Diego, California, in 1996. The band's current members are singer Travis Ryan, guitarists Josh Elmore and Belisario Dimuzio, bassist Olivier Pinard, and drummer David McGraw. Cattle Decapitation has released seven albums. Their newest album is Death Atlas, which came out in 2019. Cattle Decapitation's music is known for being about animal abuse and environmentalism. The band's members are all vegan or vegetarian. ==Studio albums== * To Serve Man (2002) * Humanure (2004) * Karma.Bloody.Karma (2006) * The Harvest Floor (2009) * Monolith of Inhumanity (2012) * The Anthropocene Extinction (2015) * Death Atlas (2019) * Terrasite (2023) ==References== Category:American musical groups
title: Cattle Decapitation
